entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
